items.sentence: A blue suit, white shirt and red tie are required for all male employees.
You can talk until you're blue in the face, but you'll never convince me.
Surprisingly, he did his last job in one-third the time it would take me.
The day will soon come when we will conquer space and travel to the moon.
I still don't have enough money to buy the motorcycle that I want to buy.
I'll lend you this CD on condition that you don't lend it to anyone else.
I can provide you with some statistical predictions of expected revenues.
Tom says that he'll pay back all the money that he owes me before Monday.
Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance you must keep moving.
Tom didn't want the rattlesnake to bite him, so he carefully backed away.
